documents.document: I have seen more battles than most of you have years. Nothing is more terrible on this earth, nothing more glorious. https://t.co/aJX4k8TKhp
“I imagine the Lannisters taught her the difference between a kitten & a dragon the day they broke down her door.” https://t.co/yah0rn2gZ7
“The Red God has his due, sweet girl, and only death may pay for life… Speak the names, and a man will do the rest.” https://t.co/IF1JDhhGFu

“Why is it that when 1 man builds a wall, the next man immediately needs to know what’s on the other side?”
-Tyrion https://t.co/mup2BS6Qry

“Some will lose more than the tips off their fingers, I promise you. They have made my kingdom bleed, and I do not forget that.”
-Stannis

“You are not wrong. I do not know. And if the gods are good, I never will.”
“The gods are seldom good, Jon Snow.” https://t.co/PE17FQGhbe

“Rhaegar … Rhaegar won, damn him… He has Lyanna now, & I have her.” The king drained his cup.
-Robert #asoiaf https://t.co/Vs5nz5qFkW
Half of them loved her like a daughter, & other half wanted to spread her legs, but either sort would die for her. https://t.co/wExM7IJVzc

“Daenerys is Prince Rhaegar’s sister but I am Rhaegar’s son. I am the only dragon that you need.”
-Aegon VI #asoiaf https://t.co/IaoBo0EE6B

“You’ll have to bow to me & call me Your Grace.”
*plop*
“You have juice on you face, Your Grace.”
-Sansa & Arya https://t.co/0eRvn7BzjJ

A dozen quips came to mind, each crueler than the one before, but Jaime only shrugged, “I dreamed of you.”
#asoiaf https://t.co/t3OASY4Fqv

A smile played across Euron’s blue lips. “I am the storm, my lord. The first storm, and the last.”
#asoiaf https://t.co/Bu4GVmMcYJ

“Jaime Lannister sends his regards.” He thrust his longsword through her son’s heart, & twisted.
-Roose Bolton https://t.co/1IH7xH07LO

“Perhaps you should speak more softly to me, then. Monsters are dangerous beasts, & just now kings seem to be dying like flies.”
-Tyrion
“…That’s all I am trusting in.” That, and my destiny. I am a prince of Dorne, & the blood of dragons is in my veins. https://t.co/oIN4dioviB

“I pray for a glimpse of Azor Ahai, and R'hllor shows me only Snow.”
-Melisandre of Asshai #asoiaf #R+L=J #capitalS https://t.co/IIPOQvQycO
“Serve the boar at my funeral feast,” Robert rasped. “Apple in its mouth, skin seared crisp. Eat the bastard.” https://t.co/RqjdmHxsVj

You smile like Gerion & fight like Tyg, & there’s some of Kevan in you … but Tyrion is Tywin’s son, not you.

“He likes the stories where the knights fight monsters.”
“Sometimes the knights are the monsters, Bran.”

“You are the Lady Asha of House Greyjoy, unless I am mistaken.”
“I am Asha of House Greyjoy, aye. Opinions differ on whether I’m a lady.”

“I would name all the men I have slain, but before I could finish your dragons would grow large as castles.”

“Mayhaps even all of us [will die]. But as another Lord Commander said, that is why they dress us in black.”

“The best pie you have ever tasted, my lords. Wash it down with Arbor gold & savor every bite.”

“The night is dark and full of turnips. Let us all pray for venison, with some onions and a bit of tasty gravy.”

-Daenerys Targaryen #asongoficeandfire https://t.co/gJgWtM5hBm

“Men have scars, women mysteries.”

Men live their lives trapped in an eternal present, between the mists of memory & the sea of shadow that is all we know of the days to come.

“What... what game?”
“The only game. The Game of Thrones.” https://t.co/J13waHqNCG

“And I seem to have prevented yours.”

Her uncle frowned. “You do like to provoke me.”
“Oh, don’t look so aggrieved. I have never met a man I didn’t provoke.”
